attributes.additional_details:
Reinstate initial closing date of April 2012 or better still increase date to April 2013 at 43.3.p to increase the UK's footprint for the G20 Summit.

Companies are being effected which will have a bearance on economy, employment yet again, taking into account the balance is not great here at the minute and this was a positive way forward for the UK citizens to become greener and help them pay the monsterous fuel bills.  A great investment for all.

Surely it is illegal to move the goal posts with little notice under the European Law.  The rest of us have to adhere to what we have set out within our businesses by law otherwise we would be in BREACH OF CONTRACT. So why does the British Government say 'do as I say' NOT as I do'???

Other countries eg Poland do not suffer with electrical bills like we do.  Let the UK citizen choose
and help take Britain forward with the initial FIT 43.3p as initially stated. BREACH OF CONTRACT TO UK CITIZENS/COMPANIES?
